text: The Kia Picanto is a car produced by Kia Motors. It replaced the Kia Pride in 2003. The Fiat Idea Hyundai i10 is based on the Picanto's platform. == Engines == * 1.0 Mazda 44 kW (60 hp) * 1.3 Toyota 48 kW (65 hp) * 1.3 CRDi 55 kW (75 hp) Picanto Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles
title: Kia Picanto
